SECRET.
G.T.3178
WAR CABINET.
ALLIED NAVAL COUNCIL.
Note by the Secretary for information of the War Cabinet.
I have been informed by the Admiralty that the first meetings of the Allied Naval Council will be held in London on 22nd and 23rd January, no earlier date being convenient to the Italian Authorities.
Pending the decisions of the Council regarding its organisation and its Secretariat, the First Lord has appointed Captain T.E.Crease., C.B., R.N. as the British Secretary to the Council.
(Signed) M.P.A.HANKEY.
2 Whitehall Gardens S.W.
3rd January 1918.
